name: identical
posTip: A word that describes a noun or pronoun.

trans_examp.trans_en: exactly the same, or very similar
trans_examp.trans_cn: 完全相同的；极为相似的

example.eg: I've got three identical blue suits.
example.egtrans: 我有3套完全相同的蓝色西装。

example.eg: The two rooms were virtually identical.
example.egtrans: 这两个房间几乎一模一样。

example.eg: The interests of both parties may not be identical, but they do overlap considerably.
example.egtrans: 双方的利益可能并不完全相同，但的确也有很多重合之处。

example.eg: The tests are identical to those carried out last year.
example.egtrans: 这些测试和去年进行的完全相同。
